sources.title: Mujeres Salvajes ( 1984)
sources.description: ADULTS ONLY! Â  WARNING: THEMES OF SEXUAL VIOLENCE Plot: Six women murderers escape from prison to dug out a gold treasure buried in the woods, but six male campers are sitting on it. Birds get shot, women and men get shot, and the prize goes to the surviving few.

metadata.Plot: Six women murderers escape from prison to dug out a gold treasure buried in the woods, but six male campers are sitting on it. Birds get shot, women and men get shot, and the prize goes to the surviving few.
metadata.Actors: Tina Romero, Jorge Santoyo, Patricia Myers
